snippet: Johan Santana was mostly effective for the Mets over five innings. But Stephen Strasburg, the Nationals’ young ace who is also trying to put serious surgery behind him, was better.
abstract: Washington Nationals defeat New York Mets, 4-0.
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana was mostly effective for the Mets over five innings. But Stephen Strasburg, the Nationals’ young ace who is also trying to put serious surgery behind him, was better.

headline.seo: Mets Play Like It’s 1962 on 50th Anniversary
headline.main: Mets Mark 50th Anniversary With an Effort Right Out of 1962
headline.print_headline: On 50th Anniversary, Mets Produce Effort Right Out of 1962
